titles.title: Preserving Access to Home Health Act of 2023
Preserving Access to Home Health Act of 2023
A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to ensure stability in payments to home health agencies under the Medicare program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Preserving Access to Home Health Act of 2023
This bill repeals certain payment adjustments for home health services under Medicare that are based on behavioral changes. It also requires the Medicare Payment Advisory Commission to incorporate certain information into its evaluations of the financial performance and impact of home health agencies, including trends under Medicare Advantage, Medicaid, and other payers with respect to home health services.
